name: too
description: Combine multiple processes' Stdout/Stderr/SIGINT to keep them all foreground

scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm link && too -c 'echo foo' -c 'sleep 5' -c 'gcloud beta emulators datastore start --project pricealert-jp' -c 'echo bar'
scripts.test:bin: npm run build && node ./dist/bin/too.js -c 'echo foo' -c 'sleep 2' -c 'echo bar'

author: otiai10
